name: climbing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 (also rock climbing) the sport of climbing on rocks or in mountains, or on specially designed walls inside or outdoors: Chris has just taken up climbing. Climbing can be dangerous. See also
free climbing
sport climbing
trad climbing
Alex Ratson/Moment/GettyImages

climbing adjective [before noun]
(PLANT)
A climbing plant grows up a supporting surface: I need some climbing plants that will grow on a north-facing wall. a climbing rose

climbing adjective [before noun]
(SPORT)
relating to the sport of climbing (= moving on rocks, up mountains, or up special walls): He needs some climbing boots. climbing techniques a climbing expedition
